the break, Kanami sighed."},{"lineNumber":96738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、大丈夫ですか、かなみさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-are you okay, Kanami-san?\""},{"lineNumber":96739,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、これ見よがしに暗い顔しおって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's this? Putting on such a gloomy face like that.\""},{"lineNumber":96740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういう顔にもなるわよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I guess a face like that happens sometimes, too."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに総統の部隊の女性は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Certainly, the women in the Supreme Leader's troops are,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆、素敵な方ばかりと思いますが……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have a wife and children."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奥さんがいらっしゃるので、
浮気する気はない、という意味では？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it means I have no intention of cheating, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうことになります」
「まあいい。一応納得してやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, fine. I suppose I can accept that for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それよりお前、奥さんがいたのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, you actually have a wife..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふん、それ聞いて面白いこと思いついたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, hearing that gives me a fun idea."
"The women under my command are my women!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の嫁さん、抱かせてもらおうか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How about I get to hold your wife!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがに虚を突かれたのか、
トルストイも黙りこくってしまう。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—That's what I'd like to say, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統のお眼鏡にかなわないかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I doubt I meet the Supreme Leader's standards..."
"You're the first person to be so honest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統閣下が初めてです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when speaking of the Supreme Leader, sir."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スープ一つ満足に作れない愚妻です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She is a foolish wife who can't even make soup properly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統の閨の役には荷が重いかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think she is unfit to be the Supreme Leader's companion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、普段からそうやってグチグチしとるから、
嫁さんまで貧乏くじを引いてしまうのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's why your wife ends up the unlucky one."
"A good wife and a good friend..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 良縁にだけは恵まれているのが自慢です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm proud to say that at least I've been blessed with good matches."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、この嫁さんで満足なのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you really satisfied with this wife of yours...?"
"Do you have a thing for ugly women?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その代わり忠誠までは求めないでね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But please don't expect my loyalty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩中、かなみが溜め息をついた。
「だ、大丈夫ですか、かなみさん」
「なんだ、これ見よがしに暗い顔しおって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's this? Putting on such a gloomy face like that."
"I guess a face like that happens sometimes, too.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに総統の部隊の女性は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Certainly, the women in the Supreme Leader's troops are,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆、素敵な方ばかりと思いますが……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have a wife and children."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奥さんがいらっしゃるので、
浮気する気はない、という意味では？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it means I have no intention of cheating, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうことになります」
「まあいい。一応納得してやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, fine. I suppose I can accept that for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それよりお前、奥さんがいたのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, you actually have a wife..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふん、それ聞いて面白いこと思いついたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, hearing that gives me a fun idea."
"The women under my command are my women!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の嫁さん、抱かせてもらおうか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How about I get to hold your wife!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがに虚を突かれたのか、
トルストイも黙りこくってしまう。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—That's what I'd like to say, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統のお眼鏡にかなわないかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I doubt I meet the Supreme Leader's standards..."
"You're the first person to be so honest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統閣下が初めてです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when speaking of the Supreme Leader, sir."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「スープ一つ満足に作れない愚妻です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She is a foolish wife who can't even make soup properly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統の閨の役には荷が重いかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think she is unfit to be the Supreme Leader's companion."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、普段からそうやってグチグチしとるから、
嫁さんまで貧乏くじを引いてしまうのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's why your wife ends up the unlucky one."
"A good wife and a good friend..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 良縁にだけは恵まれているのが自慢です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm proud to say that at least I've been blessed with good matches."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、この嫁さんで満足なのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you really satisfied with this wife of yours...?"
"Do you have a thing for ugly women?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その代わり忠誠までは求めないでね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But please don't expect my loyalty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩中、かなみが溜め息をついた。
「だ、大丈夫ですか、かなみさん」
「なんだ、これ見よがしに暗い顔しおって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's this? Putting on such a gloomy face like that."
"I guess a face like that happens sometimes, too.
